name: Poseidon
description:
Adored to this day, the second son of Chronos and Rheia is in his true temple 
in the deepest and most inhospitable place of the oceans. Some say that this is where he rests eternally, 
while others say that this is where he still observes humanity and awaits the day when he will meet again 
with his brothers and decide once and for all the future of humans and life on earth.

This is my interpretation of Poseidon, and it is also the first and only piece in 3d animation.

"A story about the world? Yes yes, we know one"
This is how the journey of 14 artists to show their vision about the Greek gods and their forms begins.

#cryptoamigues #CryptOlimpianos
